<h3 id="X38062">X(38062) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(10), X(12)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4-(b+c)*a^3-2*(2*b^2+b*c+2*c^2)*a^2+(b+c)*(b^2-3*b*c+c^2)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38062) = X(10)-4*X(6668) = X(10)+2*X(37737) = X(12)+2*X(1125) = X(214)+2*X(8068) = X(946)+2*X(31659) = 5*X(1656)+X(37733) = X(2975)-7*X(3624) = 2*X(6668)+X(37737) = 3*X(38027)+X(38058) = 5*X(38027)+X(38100) = 2*X(38027)+X(38105) = 6*X(38027)+X(38214) = 2*X(38033)+X(38162) = 2*X(38045)+X(38134) = 5*X(38058)-3*X(38100) = 2*X(38058)-3*X(38105) = 2*X(38061)+X(38208) = 2*X(38100)-5*X(38105) = 6*X(38100)-5*X(38214) = 3*X(38105)-X(38214)</b>
<p>X(38062) lies on these lines: {1,7504}, {2,758}, {5,35016}, {10,5855}, {12,1125}, {65,20104}, {79,37291}, {140,11263}, {214,3822}, {226,4973}, {404,6701}, {515,38033}, {516,21155}, {517,38045}, {518,38198}, {519,38027}, {529,19883}, {547,551}, {946,31659}, {993,5219}, {1656,30143}, {2800,38135}, {2801,38218}, {2802,3584}, {2975,3624}, {3216,31880}, {3305,6763}, {3452,4999}, {3616,37710}, {3628,11281}, {3636,37734}, {3647,7483}, {3817,5842}, {3841,27385}, {3874,11374}, {3878,11375}, {3881,37731}, {3884,5443}, {3892,17718}, {3898,5886}, {3918,27529}, {3919,11231}, {5010,10129}, {5141,37571}, {5248,37692}, {5249,6681}, {5426,37375}, {5439,20107}, {5550,20060}, {5847,38051}, {5849,38049}, {5850,38056}, {5852,38054}, {5857,38059}, {6175,15015}, {6690,11813}, {6862,31803}, {6888,31871}, {8227,11491}, {13411,25639}, {15064,37713}, {19878,31260}, {24160,33147}, {24950,25645}, {25568,26363}, {28160,38142}, {28194,38070}, {28204,38085}, {28234,38129}, {28236,38157}, {31262,34772}</p>
<p>
X(38062) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {2, 37701}, {21155, 38039}, {38033, 38109}, {38045, 38114}, {38061, 38206}<br>
X(38062) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (38134, 38114), (38162, 38109), (38208, 38206), (38214, 38058)<br>
X(38062) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 26725, 3833), (551, 11230, 32557), (5886, 10197, 3898), (6668, 37737, 10), (38105, 38214, 38058)<br>
</p>
